languages.text: "Сравнительно безопасно лишь в тех местах, где наше оружие оставило шрамы на теле отверженного сектора. Там почему-то аномалий наблюдается меньше".
"The only relatively safe areas are those parts of the corrupted sector that have been scarred by our weapons. For some reason, there are fewer anomalies there than in other places."
languages.original_text: "Сравнительно безопасно лишь в тех местах, где наше оружие оставило шрамы на теле отверженного сектора. Там почему-то аномалий наблюдается меньше".

traits.locale_text: "It is relatively safe only in those parts of the desecrated sector that have been scarred by our weapons. There are fewer anomalies than in other places for some reason."
"It is relatively safe only in those parts of the desecrated sector that have been scarred by our weapons. There are fewer anomalies than in other places for some reason."
"The only relatively safe areas are those parts of the corrupted sector that have been scarred by our weapons. For some reason, there are fewer anomalies there than in other places."
"It is relatively safe only in those parts of the desecrated sector that have been scarred by our weapons. For some reason, there are fewer anomalies than in other places."
"It is relatively safe only in those parts of the desecrated sector that have been scarred by our weapons. For some reason, there are fewer anomalies than in other places."
"The only relatively safe areas are those parts of the corrupted sector that have been scarred by our weapons. For some reason, there are fewer anomalies there than in other places."
"The only relatively safe areas are those parts of the corrupted sector that have been scarred by our weapons. For some reason, there are fewer anomalies there than in other places."
"The only relatively safe areas are those parts of the corrupted sector that have been scarred by our weapons. For some reason, there are fewer anomalies there than in other places."

languages.text: “那些被我们的武器严重破坏的腐化区域是唯一相对安全的地方。出于某种原因，那里的异象比其他地方要少。”
languages.original_text: "The only relatively safe areas are those parts of the corrupted sector that have been scarred by our weapons. For some reason, there are fewer anomalies there than in other places."

traits.locale_text: “那些被我们的武器严重破坏的腐化区域是唯一相对安全的地方。出于某种原因，那里的异象比其他地方要少。”
“那些被我们的武器严重破坏的亵渎区域是唯一相对安全的地方。出于某种原因，那里的异象比其他地方要少。”

languages.text: «Las únicas zonas relativamente seguras del sector corrupto son las que han quedado dañadas por nuestro armamento. Por alguna razón, hay menos anomalías en ellas que en otros lugares».
languages.original_text: "The only relatively safe areas are those parts of the corrupted sector that have been scarred by our weapons. For some reason, there are fewer anomalies there than in other places."

traits.locale_text: «Las únicas zonas relativamente seguras del sector corrupto son las que han quedado dañadas por nuestro armamento. Por alguna razón, hay menos anomalías en ellas que en otros lugares».

languages.text: 「比較的安全なのは、我々の武器によって損傷を受けた汚されたセクターの一部だけだ。なぜだか、他の場所に比べてアノマリーが少ないんだ」
languages.original_text: "The only relatively safe areas are those parts of the corrupted sector that have been scarred by our weapons. For some reason, there are fewer anomalies there than in other places."

traits.locale_text: 「比較的安全なのは、我々の武器によって損傷を受けた冒涜されたセクターの一部だけだ。なぜだか、他の場所に比べてアノマリーが少ないんだ」
「比較的安全なのは、我々の武器によって損傷を受けた冒涜されたセクターの一部だけだ。なぜだか、他の場所に比べてアノマリーが少ないんだ」

languages.text: « Les seules zones relativement sûres sont les parties du secteur corrompu que nous avons pilonnées. Pour une raison inconnue, les anomalies y sont moins nombreuses. »
languages.original_text: "The only relatively safe areas are those parts of the corrupted sector that have been scarred by our weapons. For some reason, there are fewer anomalies there than in other places."

traits.locale_text: « Les seules zones relativement sûres sont les parties du secteur corrompu que nous avons pilonnées. Pour une raison inconnue, les anomalies y sont moins nombreuses. »

languages.text: "Die einzigen vergleichsweise sicheren Gebiete sind die Teilen des verderbten Sektors, die von unseren Waffen getroffen wurden. Aus irgendeinem Grund gibt es dort weniger Anomalien als an anderen Orten."
languages.original_text: "The only relatively safe areas are those parts of the corrupted sector that have been scarred by our weapons. For some reason, there are fewer anomalies there than in other places."

traits.locale_text: "Die einzigen vergleichsweise sicheren Gebiete sind die Teilen des verderbten Sektors, die von unseren Waffen getroffen wurden. Aus irgendeinem Grund gibt es dort weniger Anomalien als an anderen Orten."
"Es ist nur in den Teilen des entweihten Sektors relativ sicher, die von unseren Waffen verwundet wurden. Aus irgendeinem Grund gibt es dort weniger Anomalien als anderswo."

languages.text: "Yozlaşmış sektörün silahlarımızla hasar gören kısımları, nispeten daha güvenli. Nedendir bilinmez, diğer kısımlarda oraya kısayla daha az anomali mevcut."
languages.original_text: "The only relatively safe areas are those parts of the corrupted sector that have been scarred by our weapons. For some reason, there are fewer anomalies there than in other places."

traits.locale_text: "Yozlaşmış sektörün silahlarımızla hasar gören kısımları, nispeten daha güvenli. Nedendir bilinmez, diğer kısımlarda oraya kısayla daha az anomali mevcut."
